name: The Pebble of Kajaro
tooltip:
The Pebble of KajaroLevel 60

Welcome back, <class>. I can see that the pebble has seen much use. Many of our foes have fallen to your otherworldly abilities. Their suffering has been great. It is time that I enhance the power of the pebble. Give it to me.

Requirements:
- Pebble of Kajaro
